item.title: Levodopa Fails to Boost Poststroke Motor Recovery
item.description: Levodopa added to standard rehab is not superior to placebo for motor function improvement at 3 months in patients with acute stroke, the ESTREL trial...

item.title: Severe Anaphylaxis More Common in Older Adults
item.description: Older adults with anaphylaxis are more likely to end up intubated or in the ICU than younger adults. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Swedish Study Maps Maternal Mental Health Across Pregnancy
item.description: Postpartum women show increased risk for depression and psychosis risk shortly after delivery. Medscape Medical News
